title: Large-Scale Online Competency Development Course for Improving Job-Centered Communication Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic academic writing and presentation experience
context.additional_context: Program for learners preparing for medical/legal/technical professions to develop practice-centered communication skills reflecting regional industry demands. Operated in BYOD environments with continuous feedback via formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can create structured documents reflecting discipline-specific requirements when writing business reports and proposals.
Learners can apply effective verbal communication strategies in negotiation and conflict management situations with clients/colleagues.
Learners can execute techniques for clear message delivery and comprehension in asynchronous communication using online collaboration tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
